item.title: About Zettabytes
item.description:
ZETTABYTES

Keep it simple, but not simpler

A place where I keep what I’ve been through.

$${\sqrt {n}}\left(\left({\frac {1}{n}}\sum _{i=1}^{n}X_{i}\right)-\mu \right)\ {\xrightarrow {d}}\ N\left(0,\sigma ^{2}\right)$$
